$callback,  
$file =  null)

public function add_group($group_identifier,
$group_name)
Allows plugins to add (register) a group that members can have assigned to them, that way these plugins can use permissions for any features they may add.

$callback,

$is_fatal =  false,
$file =  null,

function mitigate_globals()

$hook_name =  null,

$line =  0)

public function return_action($action_name =  null)
Returns the requested action, the first index contains the callback, the second contains the file to be included before calling on the callback, unless it is null.
public function return_group($group_identifier =  null)

$subaction_name =  null)

abstract public function table_sql($table,  
$drop_if_exists =  true,
$file =  null)
Generates the CREATE TABLE command for the specified table, if $file is specified, append that data to the specified file and return a bool (TRUE on success, FALSE on failure), otherwise return the string containing the CREATE TABLE.
abstract public function tables()
Returns an array containing all the tables in the database.
